scripts.start: pnpm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node server/dist/index.js
scripts.build: pnpm run build:common && pnpm run build:client && pnpm run build:server
scripts.dev: concurrently --names "COMMON,CLIENT,SERVER" --prefix-colors "yellow,green,blue" --kill-others  "pnpm run dev:common" "pnpm run dev:client" "pnpm run dev:server"
scripts.install:all: pnpm install:common && pnpm install:client && pnpm install:server
